name: Synchronized Swimming
description:
Synchronized swimming is a casual sports game which needs player to give order to the athletes to make them do poses in the swimming pool. Beside giving gesture order, the player also needs to focus on athletes' breath, keeping from drowning in the water.

Credits:

  • Junbai Ye / Game Designer, Programmer
  • Zhicong Jiang / Game Designer, Programmer
  • Zhe Dong / Game Designer, Artist
  • Instructor: Steven Goodale
  • Made in GAM 651: Prototype Game Development

Platform/System:

  • Built in Unity
  • For Mobile Android
